definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swerve, fall away (akin to [[שָׂטָה]] q.v.; NH [[סוּט]] Hiph. is shake, move away; As. šâṭu, rebel, Meissn:90; Eth. 3ot’a:: bring back, restore; in Vulgate apostatize is [[סְטָא]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pl. cstr. [[וֶשָׂטֵי כָזׇב]] Ps 40:5 those falling away to falsehood (Gunk:Schöpf. 40 [[וְשָׂטָה]]).
